mods.abstract: Cadastral map of East Baton Rouge Parish property of Rosalie Monget. Also shows landowners' names and location of adjacent properties. Monget's holdings shaded in red pencil.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
